content:
88
DEPOSIT AND ACCESS TO MARITAL PROPERTY AGREEMENT
(1) Marital property agreements shall be deposited with notaries in accordance with the regulations governing the notary service.
(2) The contents of marital property agreements may be accessed by persons identified by the Act governing notary service. These persons may also request a transcript of a notarial record, either certified or not.
(3) The contents of marital property agreements may also be accessed by courts in proceedings where the decision of the court depends on the contents of the marital property agreement.
 
FAMILY
